member.name: M:ParamFileEditor.frmMainGUI.GetExceptionStackTrace(System.Exception,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parses the .StackTrace text of the given expression to return a compact description of the current stack
member.returns: String similar to "Stack trace: clsCodeTest.Test-:-clsCodeTest.TestException-:-clsCodeTest.InnerTestException in clsCodeTest.vb:line 86"
